sections.heading: lands; acquisition for public highway
sections.text: The Department of Transportation and the county board of any county may acquire land necessary to establish a public highway over or across any educational lands.SourceLaws 1907, c. 134, ยง 1, p. 437;Laws 1913, c. 40, ยง 1, p. 135;R.S.1913, ยง 5855;Laws 1915, c. 10
